plot: The Prince suffers from severe hypochrondria and melancholy, and only laughter can save him. However, there is a plot, by his ambitious cousin, to keep the Prince feeling depressed.
title: L'amour des trois oranges
plot_es: The Prince suffers from severe hypochrondria and melancholy, and only laughter can save him. However, there is a plot, by his ambitious cousin, to keep the Prince feeling depressed.
plot_en: The Prince suffers from severe hypochrondria and melancholy, and only laughter can save him. However, there is a plot, by his ambitious cousin, to keep the Prince feeling depressed.
